mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(news_id, editor_id, news_title, news_create, news_content, publisher, news_modified, news_cover_path, news_intro) VALUES(#{newsId}, #{editorId}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsCreate}, #{newsContent}, #{publisher}, #{newsModified}, #{newsCoverPath}, #{newsIntro})
mapper.select: SELECT news_id, editor_id, news_title, news_create, news_content, publisher, news_modified, news_cover_path, news_intro FROM news WHERE news_id = #{value}

SELECT a.account_id "account.account_id", a.account_name "account.account_name", n.news_id, n.editor_id, n.news_title, n.news_create, n.publisher, n.news_modified, n.news_intro FROM account a INNER JOIN news n ON n.editor_id = a.account_id
SELECT news_id, editor_id, news_title, news_create, news_content, publisher, news_modified, news_intro FROM news WHERE editor_id = #{value}
SELECT news_id, news_title, news_create, news_intro, news_cover_path, publisher FROM news ORDER BY news_id DESC LIMIT #{value}, 10
